text: <!channel>: wanted to throw out another brief invite to anyone interested in joining the wine note hackathon that we’re hosting here starting at 5:30, monday the 14th. if anyone is interested in coming, we’d love to have you (designers and producers too)! so far gaston, connor, josh, marce, and i will be in attendance. the event is centered around wine and there will be tasting. should be a good time. if you have any questions, you can hit me up on slack or in person today or monday.
